Donald Rumsfeld , who has known Hosni Mubarak for decades, responded carefully when asked whether he is a dictator. He clearly has perpetuated himself in office. He clearly has hoped that his son would succeed him. There have been a number of things that have inhibited freer political systems, Donald Rumsfeld said of the Egyptian president, stopping short of offering any further criticism of Hosni Mubarak .
